K12D0503_H0471:417a-27: shig / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
K12D0503_H0471:417a-28: chen po lag na rdo rjes gzungs kyi gsang sngags
K12D0503_H0471:417b-0: yang dag par rdzogs @417b pa'i sangs rgyas bdun po dag la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0503_H0471:417b-1: rdo rje 'dzin thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0503_H0471:417b-4: badzra p'a sha dh'a ra n'i /
K12D0503_H0471:417b-5: sa ma sa ma sa manta /
K12D0503_H0471:417b-6: aa pra ti ha ta badzre /
K12D0503_H0471:417b-7: sha ma sha ma pra sha mantu /
K12D0503_H0471:417b-8: sarba bya dha ya:ku ru ku ru sarba karm'a ni /
K12D0503_H0471:417b-9: sa ma ya ma nu sma ra bha ga b'an badzra p'a ni /
K12D0503_H0471:417b-10: sarba a'a sh'a ma me pa ri p'u ra ya sv'ah'a //
K12D0503_H0471:417b-12: gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag gi mtshan dang /
K12D0503_H0471:417b-13: sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa dang /
K12D0503_H0471:417b-14: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang /
K12D0503_H0471:417b-15: klog pa de'i re ba thams cad bdag gis yongs su bskang bar bgyi /
K12D0503_H0471:417b-16: don thams cad kyang bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K12D0503_H0471:417b-17: gal te des bdag mthong bar 'tshal na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'drir stsal bar bgyi'o /
K12D0503_H0471:417b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag gi sku gzugs bdun kyang bgyi /
K12D0503_H0471:417b-19: rdo rje 'dzin yang sku gdung dang bcas bar bgyi /
K12D0503_H0471:417b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la yang ji skad gong du smos pa bzhin du /
K12D0503_H0471:417b-28: pheg rdob pa rnams kyis mchod de bskor bar bgyi /
K12D0503_H0471:417b-29: gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag kyang gdon bar bgyi /
K12D0503_H0471:417b-30: sems can thams cad la yang phan pa'i sems dang /
K12D0503_H0471:417b-32: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bsnyen gnas la gnas te /
K12D0503_H0471:418a-1: gsum khrus bgyi zhing gos lan gsum brje bar bgyi /
K12D0503_H0471:418a-3: zla ba phyi ma bco lnga nya'i bar du /
K12D0503_H0471:418a-4: nyin cig bzhin rig sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
K12D0503_H0471:418a-5: na de dag la bdag gis rmi lam du mthong
K12D0503_H0471:418a-8: re ba thams cad kyang yongs su bskang bar bgyi'o //
K12D0503_H0471:418a-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams
K12D0503_H0471:418a-10: cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje
K12D0503_H0471:418a-11: la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K12D0503_H0471:418a-13: khyod kyis gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag legs par smras pa legs so //
K12D0503_H0471:418a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12D0503_H0471:418a-17: nged kyis sems can thams cad kyi don dang /
K12D0503_H0471:418a-19: re ba thams cad yongs su bskong ba'i phyir gzungs
K12D0503_H0471:418a-20: kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag byin gyis brlabs
K12D0503_H0471:418a-21: so // de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis /
K12D0503_H0471:418a-24: 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la bos te bka' stsal pa /
K12D0503_H0471:418a-26: khyod la chos kyi rnam grangs chen po 'di rjes su gtad kyi /
K12D0503_H0471:418a-27: khyod kyi ci nas kyang chos kyi rnam grangs chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dang mtshungs pa /
K12D0503_H0471:418a-28: sdig pa thams cad byang bar byed pa /
K12D0503_H0471:418a-29: re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba 'di phyi
K12D0503_H0471:418a-30: ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma
K12D0503_H0471:418b-0: la sems can @418b bsod nams chung du /
K12D0503_H0471:418b-2: 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa rnams kyi lag
K12D0503_H0471:418b-3: tu myur tu nub par mi 'gyur bar srungs shig
K12D0503_H0471:418b-4: / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te /
K12D0503_H0471:418b-5: bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K12D0503_H0471:418b-6: bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo
K12D0503_H0471:418b-7: sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
K12D0503_H0471:418b-9: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K12D0503_H0471:418b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0503_H0471:418b-13: de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs
K12D0503_H0471:418b-14: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
K12D0503_H0471:418b-15: rgyas bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par
K12D0503_H0471:418b-16: rgyas pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K12D0503_H0471:418b-17: byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes dam bcas pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K12D0503_H0471:418b-18: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong zhing
K12D0503_H0471:418b-19: re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba zhes bya
K12D0503_H0471:418b-21: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis kyis dam bcas pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K12D0503_H0471:418b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K12D0503_H0471:418b-25: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K12D0503_H0471:418b-26: gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang /
K12D0503_H0471:418b-27: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /
K12D0503_H0471:418b-31: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K12D0503_H0471:419a-1: ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K12D0503_H0471:419a-2: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi
K12D0503_H0471:419a-3: smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba
K12D0503_H0471:419a-4: theg pa chen po'i mdo brgyad brgya pa rdzogs so
K12D0503_H0471:419a-5: //// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K12D0503_H0471:419a-8: zhus chen gyi lo tstsha ba bande ye shes sdes
K12D0503_H0471:419a-9: bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos
